content:
The high representative of the EU on Foreign Affairs and Security Policy, Josep Borrel, commented on Russia's large -scale attack against Ukraine.

He is about itwroteThe Twitter Twitter.

Josep Borrel emphasized that this threatens the safety of Zaporizhzhya NPP.

“Russia continues its cruel attacks on the population of Ukraine, inflicting night bombing of energy infrastructure with drones and rockets, killing and injuring dozens of people, threatening the safety of the Zaporozhye atomic power plant.
It must be stopped! All guilty will be held accountable, ”the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the night of March 22, enemyDrewcombined rocket and aviation strike on the objects of critical infrastructure of Ukraine. Anti -air combat destroyed 92 air targets.
title: Russia continues its cruel attacks on Ukraine, jeopardizing the safety
